name: The Story of Sanelma
description:
A short magical adventure featuring a witch searching for a missing ingredient.  Roughly 5-10 mins for one full playthrough.

There are two bad ends, a neutral one and the true ending. Includes  one image with visible blood and, depending on the ending you get, can include brief written descriptions of gore/violence. 

This is one half of my thesis project taking a look at animations and visual novels as tools for storytelling. The other half is an animatic created with the same story and setting, which can be watched on Youtube: The Story of Sanelma - ANIMATIC

If you'd like to partake in the study, you can find the form related to that here: Thesis Survey - Animation and Visual Novels

NOTE: Web version is a bit broken. It's somewhat functional on Firefox, but only plays on Chrome if the developer tools are open for some reason. Also one bad ending is unattainable in the web version. You can download the game for a better experience :)
